info.help_short: Quickly create and start SmartIDE development environment
info.help_long: A longer description that spans multiple lines and likely contains examples and usage of using your command. For example: Cobra is a CLI library for Go that empowers applications. This application is a tool to generate the needed files to quickly create a Cobra application.
